intro: Experience a summer love story where your choices shape the outcome. Will it be a forever love or just a memory? Your unforgettable journey begins!
description:
Get ready to experience a summer that will change your life! Imagine meeting someone who will transform your world forever. One summer, a shy and reserved boy crosses paths with an outgoing, genuine, and energetic girl. Could this encounter be the start of something unforgettable?

This game invites you to be part of a summer love story where your decisions change everything. Will you dare to help the boy step out of his comfort zone? Would you risk it all for a love that might end when summer does? Live romantic moments, overcome misunderstandings, face unexpected twists, and decide if this bond deserves a “forever” or a nostalgic goodbye.

With visuals that capture the vibrant colors of summer, music that awakens cherished memories, and a narrative that will make you dream, this is more than just a game, it’s your own love story. Are you ready to take control and write the ending to this unforgettable summer?
